Direzione o partecipazione a comitati ed.content: Membro del comitato editoriale della Schweizerische Zeitschrift für Geschichte / Rivista Storica Svizzera
Co-direttore della collana "Selbst-Konstruktion. Schweizerische und oberdeutsche Selbstzeugnisse 1500-1850 " presso la casa editrice Schwabe (Basel).

Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: «Mercanti francesi e nazione francese a Napoli nel Settecento» (paper), international conference Piazze mercantili, mercanti e poteri sulle rotte tirreniche. I traffici marittimi tra Francia e Italia nell’età della ‘grande trasformazione’ (1700-1850), Università di Bari.

«Guerra, rivoluzione, xenofobia. L’espulsione dei francesi dal Regno di Napoli (1793)» (paper), conference Il Mediterraneo delle città: identità e spazi (secoli XVI-XXI), Società Geografica Italiana, Roma.

«Come migrano le istituzioni. I giudici conservatori delle Nazioni straniere nella penisola iberica e nel Regno di Napoli (secoli XVII-XVIII)» (paper), international conference Istituzioni e trasporti marittimi nel Mediterraneo tra età antica e crescita moderna, Università di Napoli “Parthenope”.

«On the manipulatory use of juridical resources and institutional classifications. The case of foreign nations in eighteenth-century Naples» (paper), international conference Between Parallel Society and Integration. Diasporas and Transcultural Agency in the Eastern Mediterranean in the Late Middle Ages and the Early Modern Era, Universität Heidelberg.
«Images and Techniques. Joseph Furttenbach as an Agent of Cultural Transfer between Italy and Germany» (paper), Sixteenth Century Studies Conference, Université de Genève.

«Seditious Jacobins or Useful Migrants? Defining the ‘Enemy Alien’ in Naples during the Wars of the French Revolution» (paper), international conference Port Cities at War from the 18th to the 20th Centuries, University of Liverpool, 25-27 November 2009.
Organizzazione del convegno internazionale "Transfers. Empirische und theoretische Perspektiven" (Universität Basel)

«Migranten als Unternehmer. Vertrauen, Netzwerke, Konfliktlösungsmechanismen» (paper), international workshop Ökonomien. Aktuelle Fragestellungen der Wirtschaftsgeschichte, Universität Basel / Schweizerisches Wirtschaftsarchiv.

«Au-delà du binôme État/étranger. La condition des migrants dans l’ancien régime entre diplomatie et pratiques judiciaires. Le cas de Naples dans une perspective comparée» (paper), international conference Travail, migrations, souveraineté des États. Histoire sociale et relations internationales, Sciences Po, Paris.

«The Journal of Ship’s Surgeon Johann Peter Oettinger. The Unpublished Account of a Hinterlander in the Atlantic Slave Trade, 1682-1696» (paper, with Craig Koslofsky), international conference The Slave Business and Its Material and Moral Hinterlands in Continental Europe, University of Liverpool / International Slavery Museum.

«Un seul peuple? Migrants suisses à Naples (XVIIIe-XXe siècles)» (paper, with Daniela L. Caglioti and Marco Rovinello), international conference La Suisse ailleurs. Les Suisses de l’étranger – les Suisses à l’étranger, Universität Bern.
Organizzazione del convegno internazionale "Frauds: Norms, institutions, and illegal economic practices in Mediterranean Europe (16th-19th centuries)" (Universität Basel)

«Johann Peter Oettinger. The Journal of a Slave Ship’s Surgeon between Early Modern Autobiographical Writing and Wilhelmine Colonial Literature» (paper), Swiss Researching Africa Days, Universität Bern.

«Transkulturelle Kontakte am Hofe von Savi. Europäer im westafrikanischen Königreich Hueda (17.-18. Jahrhundert)» (paper), international conference Schweizerische Geschichtstage, Université de Fribourg.

«Histoire connectées – histoires narrées. La microhistoire à l’épreuve de l’histoire atlantique» (paper), international conference Egodocuments et pratiques socioculturelles (XVIe - XIXe siècles), Université de Lausanne.

«Konsulate und Nationen in italienischen Hafenstädten des Ancien Régime» (paper, with Guillaume Calafat), international conference Protegierte und Protektoren. Ungleiche politische Beziehungen zwischen Partnerschaft und Dominanz (16. bis frühes 20. Jahrhundert), Universität Bern.

«Transcultural Interactions and Epistemological Asymmetries: Europeans at the Royal Court of the Kingdom of Hueda (West Africa, late 17th - early 18th century)» (paper), international conference From Switzerland to India, to Africa and the Way Back. Missions and Other Kinds of Encounters, Université de Lausanne.
«Sujets et étrangers dans l’Europe d’Ancien Régime» (paper), international workshop La citoyenneté. Institution d'intégration ou de dissociation?, Institut d’Études Avancées, Paris.

«Grossfriedrichsburg, the first German Colony in Africa? European Overseas Trade, Global Entanglements and National Memory» (paper), international workshop The changing margins of Europe. Frontiers and demarcations of a continent from the 18th to the 20th century, Centre d’histoire de Sciences Po, Paris.
Organizzazione del convegno internazionale "Santé militaire, santé coloniale. Guerres, maladies et empires au long XIXe siècle" (Service Historique de la Défense, Vincennes)

«Napoleonic wars and medical knowledge. Military physician Antonio Savaresi in Egypt, the Caribbean and Italy» (paper, with Andrea Graf), international workshop Santé militaire, santé coloniale. Guerres, maladies et empires au long XIXe siècle, Service Historique de la Défense, Château de Vincennes.

«Le crachoir chinois du roi: marchandises globales, cultures courtoises et vaudou dans le Bénin précolonial (XVIIe-XIXe siècle)» (paper), European Conference on African Studies, Université de Paris 1 Panthéon-Sorbonne.

«The French Wars in Egypt and the Caribbean and the Development of Colonial Medicine» (paper), international conference Luso-Brasilian Meeting on the History of Tropical Medicine, Universidade Nova de Lisboa / Instituto de Higiene e Medicina Tropical.

«La science aux marges des champs de bataille. Les pérégrinations d’un médecin militaire napolitain entre le Nil et les Antilles (fin XVIIIe – début XIXe siècle)» (paper), international workshop Collectes et savoirs naturalistes de terrain. Des explorateurs aux collections de Muséums, Muséum national d’histoire naturelle, Paris.

«Hermes und der Leviathan. Maritimer Fernhandel und institutionelle Reformen im Königreich Neapel (18. Jahrhundert)» (paper), international workshop Wirtschaften in der Vormoderne. Brackweder Arbeitskreis für Mittelalterforschung, Universität Zürich.

«Hermes, the Leviathan and the grand narrative of New Institutional Economics. The quest for efficient institutions in Brandenburg-Prussia and the Kingdom of Naples (17th-18th centuries)» (paper, with Alida Clemente), international conference Journées suisses d’histoire, Université de Lausanne.

«The Making of Colonial Medical Knowledge during the French Wars: Military Physicians in Egypt and the Caribbean (1798–1803)» (paper), 7th international conference of the European Society for the History of Science, Univerzita Karlova, Praga.

«"Das ist also der alte Rhein, von dem die Lieder singen...". Literarische Identitätskonstruktionen und touristische Reisepraktiken im Tagebuch des preussischen Offiziers Friedrich Wilhelm Oettinger (1824)» (paper), international conference Der Rhein als politische Landschaft, 1815-heute, Universität Düsseldorf.

Direzione o partecipazione alle attivit\.content: Partecipazione al PRIN "Il Mediterraneo delle città: scambi, confronti, culture, rappresentazioni" (unità di ricerca dell'Università di Tor Vergata)

Co-direttore della rete internazionale "Aux bords des institutions : pouvoirs, acteurs et pratiques marchandes dans l’Europe méditerranéenne (XVII-XIX siècle)". Istituzioni della rete: Universität Basel, Università di Bari, Maison Méditerranéenne des Sciences de l'Homme (Aix-en-Provence), École Française de Rome. Pagina progetto: https://dg.philhist.unibas.ch/forschung/ projekte/projektseiten/aux-bords-des-ins titutions/
Co-fondatore e membro del comitato direttivo di GRAINES (Graduate Interdisciplinary Network in European Studies). https://grainesnetwork.com/

Responsabilita' scientifica per progetti.content: Responsabile del progetto "Histoires connectées, histoires narrées. Le journal d'un barbier-chirurgien entre tour de compagnon et traite négrière" finanziato dal Fondo Nazionale Svizzero/Programma Ambizione, presso l'Universiotà di Losanna. www.robertozaugg.ch/Oettinger-Project.html

Co-direttore del progetto "Europe, Africa, and the Caribbean: The Travel Account and Biography of Johann Peter Oettinger, 1682–1696" finanziato dal National Endowment for the Humanities (USA), presso la University of Illinois. http://www.neh.gov/news/press-release/2016-08-09
